archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.4.9b: b) leave messages containing confidential information on answering machines or voice messages since these can be replayed by unauthorised persons, stored on communal systems or stored incorrectly as a result of misdialing.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
